net.codemusic.smartears
Interface IScoreManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScoreManager
public interface IScoreManager

This interface represents the class that is responible for keeping score and creating score related events

Method Summary
 void correct(IAnswer answer)
          Called when you user has chosen the correct answer
 int getCorrectCount()
          Returns the total number of times the user has correctly identified an answer
 int getIncorrectCount()
          Returns the total number of times the user has guessed incorrectly
 int getRepeatCount()
          Returns the total number of times the user has had a question played over
 int getScore()
          Returns the users score in "points" based on the weights of particular answers
 void incorrect(IAnswer answer)
          Called when the user has chosen an incorrect answer
 void repeat(IAnswer answer)
          Called when the user has requested an additional hearing of an example
 void reset()
          Resets all scores and statistics to their initial values
